description: This library implements an in-process database for storing and retrieving class objects and their property values. The library is designed to be as easy to use as possible with a small public API. The backing storage is Azure Table Storage, so Azure account credentials are requried to use the library. This library is an experimental but compatible and fully working sibling of the Orthogonal.ObjectDb.Esent library which uses an in-process high-performance ESENT database as the backing storage. The ESENT backed database should be used where high-performance is required.
releaseNotes: The Azure ListByIndex EQ, GT and GE conditions now have the same behaviour as the original ESENT implementation (Issue #8). Azure ListByIndex LE and LT throw a NotSupportedException. The name of the Table persisting identity sequence seeds has the ZZ testing prefix removed (Issue #9).
summary: A lightweight in-process small-API database for storing arbitrary class objects and their property values. The backing storage is Azure Table Storage. This is an experimental but fully working library that works identically to the original Orthogonal.ObjectDb.Esent library.
